title: Hey, friends. We know it's a crazy time for the economy, but don't forget to enable 2FA for payments by Saturday
description: Deadline for multi-factor authentication in UK banking looms Saturday is the delayed deadline for UK banks and financial institutions to have implemented two-factor authentication for payment transactions.…
content: Saturday is the delayed deadline for UK banks and financial institutions to have implemented two factor authentication for payment transactions This is the result of the EU Payment Services Directive PSD for Strong Customer Authentication SCA This chars
